movies.title: Back to the Future Part II
movies.plot: Marty and Doc are at it again in this wacky sequel to the 1985 blockbuster as the time-traveling duo head to 2015 to nip some McFly family woes in the bud. But things go awry thanks to bully Biff Tannen and a pesky sports almanac. In a last-ditch attempt to set things straight, Marty finds himself bound for 1955 and face to face with his teenage parents -- again.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 8 nominations.

Marty and Doc travel to this day in the future

movies.title: Back to the Future Part III
movies.plot: The final installment of the Back to the Future trilogy finds Marty digging the trusty DeLorean out of a mineshaft and looking for Doc in the Wild West of 1885. But when their time machine breaks down, the travelers are stranded in a land of spurs. More problems arise when Doc falls for pretty schoolteacher Clara Clayton, and Marty tangles with Buford Tannen.

events.title: Doc sends Marty to this day back in time
Doc and Marty work out how to get back to the future
the Hill County clock is dedicated
the day in the future Marty returns to

movies.title: Back to the Future
movies.plot: Eighties teenager Marty McFly is accidentally sent back in time to 1955, inadvertently disrupting his parents' first meeting and attracting his mother's romantic interest. Marty must repair the damage to history by rekindling his parents' romance and - with the help of his eccentric inventor friend Doc Brown - return to 1985.
